title: Cyber Security Engineer
company_description:
PT Sisindokom Lintasbuana was established on April 17, 1990. On February 2005, we were acquired by PT Aneka Spring Telekomindo (ASTEL), and as a member of ASTEL Group who’s established as a leading provider of telecommunication and networking Solutions Company in Indonesia.

For almost 2 decades of experience, we have been providing Information Communication Technology (ICT) Solutions to the business community, and we commit to provide the most comprehensive and effective ICT solutions.

Solutions

• Database & Data Warehousing Solutions
• Middleware Solutions

about_the_job:
Responsibilities

Create Method of Procedure (MOP) and Low-Level Design (LLD) documents for security systems.
Assess designs, ensuring security measures are integrated into the overall system architecture.
Install and integrate security systems, including firewalls, intrusion detection/prevention systems, and other security-related hardware and software.
Develop best practices and security standards for the organization.
Troubleshoot network issues related to security infrastructure.
Provide maintenance support for security systems, ensuring optimal functionality.

Requirements

Bachelor's Degree (S1) for any major related to IT (Computer Science, Mathematics/Physics, Electro, Telecommunication, Informatics, Information Systems, etc)
Have good knowledge and concepts in OSI layer and TCP/IP, network, and routing switching
At least 3 years handling one/or more security products: Palo Alto, Fortinet, F5, Cisco
Must have the ability to work under pressure, be a quick learner, have Good English, and have good communication and presentation skills
Comfortable working in a fast-paced and dynamic environment
Have a valid Security product certification such as NSE4/higher and/or F5 BIG-IP and/or CCNP Security
Have an understanding of best practices and how to implement them at a business-wide level
Critical thinking skills and the ability to solve problems as they arise
Analyze security systems and seek improvements continuously

title: Cloud Engineer
company_description:
PT Datacomm Diangraha is the leading Information Technology (IT) service providers in Indonesia with focus in the following areas: IT Infrastructure, Cloud & Datacenter, IT Security, and DevOps.

Company Overview
For over two decades, Datacomm has led our customers in the adoption of advanced innovative technologies and best practice, in order to increase their performance, stay ahead of the competition and capture the new market opportunity in Digital Generation Era.

We partner with leading global technology vendor in Cloud, Cybersecurity, Virtualisation and Software Define Networking to deliver leading edge Information & Communication Technology Services to our Operators, Government, Military and Enterprise customers.

Datacomm has proven to be a valuable partner for our customers throughout the lifecycle of their digital project. Designing, building, operating and maintaining IT infrastructure is at the heart of our business.

Supported by our world class service facilities, service offices in many cities, and highly certified engineers, Datacomm ensures the best service delivery to our customers anywhere in Indonesia.

Datacomm believes in constant improvement and continually invests in its people, solutions and services to meet the changing and challenging needs of our customers.

Our team poise to be the best in managing and operationg the IT technology such that we can support you to be the leader in your market.
about_the_job:
World class local data center coming soon to Jabodetabek area! The progress of the construction of the Jakarta IV Datacomm Diangraha data center has reached more than 50 percent, and is targeted for completion in mid-2023. This is proof of Datacomm's seriousness in supporting the acceleration of digitalization in Indonesia and providing the best quality for all customers. Therefore we need the best talent to occupy positions in the Data center office in Jababeka.

Responsibilities:
Provide service request fulfillment and L1 incident handling for all of Datacomm Cloud Services.
Provide service monitoring for all services and infrastructure.
Communication to customers.
Daily and monthly operational reports.
Standby shifting 24x7.

Requirements:
Graduated from reputable university majoring in Telecommunication Engineering or Computer Science or Information Technology with minimum GPA of 3.0.
1 year experience Experience working in the field of cloud engineering is preferable.
Fresh Graduate are welcome to apply.
Have knowledge of networking (TCP/IP, OSI Layer, IP Subnetting).
Familiar with Windows Server and Active Directory/ User Access Management.
Familiar and have experience operating Monitoring Tools (PRTG, MRTG, etc).
Able to work in a team or individually and understand the concept of Customer Service Oriented.
Have knowledge of Cloud Basic Concept.
Willing to be placed in Jababeka, Cikarang.

#Datacomm #CloudEngineer #Recruitment #CloudComputing #ITSolution

title: Cloud Solution Manager
company_description:
PT Visionet Data Internasional is the largest Digital IT Managed Services Company in Indonesia. Offering a nation-wide coverage in more than 140 service points throughout Indonesia. Certified in IISO 9001:2015, ISO 27001:2013, ISO 20000-1:2011, our focus is in helping and supporting our customers in managing their IT operations and ensuring the optimal performances as well as reliability and effectiveness in day-to-day basis so that our customers can focus in their core business. PT VisioNet Data Internasional offers an integrated outsourcing from Data Centre operation services for various business applications to day-to-day IT operation in almost all parts of Indonesia.

Started its operation in 2006; PT VisioNet Data Internasional now has already been supported by over 2000 personnel around Indonesia. Utilizing the state-of-the-art technologies, PT VisioNet Data Internasional will support your IT operation, ensuring its optimal performance, reliability and scalability as our customers grow their core business. We are able to assists cutomers anywhere, anytime through our nationwide service points and fully supported by 24/7 contact center.

With our well-experienced, professionals and highly skilled consultants, our people will support your outsourcing process from technical and organizational point of view. You can readily expand IT infrastructure and key business processes, without new capital investment or the burden of recruiting new IT personnel. You will be free to focus more effectively on the core business.

Our Vision:
to be an admired company to work for and trusted partner to work with, in the industries that we choose.

Our Mission:
to provide end-to-end IT Managed Services that accelerate our clients to attain their business goals.
about_the_job:
Roles and Responsibilities of Cloud Solution Manager :
Monitoring and managing cloud solution architect workload
Reviewing cloud solution design to meet business objectives
Meeting with customer management and executives to review the long and short-term objectives to assist them in understanding how cloud technologies might help them achieve their objectives.
Developing ongoing cloud initiatives aligned with customer goals.
Helping cloud solution architect to translating project-specific requirements into a cloud architecture.
Reviewing cost revenue cloud solution calculation
 Cloud Solution Manager Skills:
Understanding of operating systems such as Windows and Linux.
Solid understanding of networking concepts such as DNS, TCP/IP, HTTP, and VPC (Virtual Private Cloud).
Knowledge of security concepts such as firewall, VPN, identity and access management.
Expertise with container such as Kubernetes or Docker
Excellent communication & leadership skills
Understanding cost revenue cloud solution calculation
Preferable to have AWS Associate/professional Certification

title: IT Supervisor (Pre-opening) at Regent Bali Canggu
company_description:
About IHG®
IHG Hotels & Resorts [LON:IHG, NYSE:IHG (ADRs)] is a global hospitality company, with a purpose to provide True Hospitality for Good.

With a family of 18 hotel brands and IHG One Rewards, one of the world's largest hotel loyalty programmes, IHG has over 6,000 open hotels in over 100 countries, and more than 1,900 in the development pipeline.

Luxury & Lifestyle: Six Senses Hotels Resorts Spas, Regent Hotels & Resorts, InterContinental Hotels & Resorts, Vignette Collection, Kimpton Hotels & Restaurants, Hotel Indigo
Premium: voco hotels, HUALUXE Hotels & Resorts, Crowne Plaza Hotels & Resorts, EVEN Hotels
Essentials: Holiday Inn Hotels & Resorts, Holiday Inn Express, avid hotels
Suites: Atwell Suites, Staybridge Suites, Holiday Inn Club Vacations, Candlewood Suites
Exclusive Partners: Iberostar Beachfront Resorts

InterContinental Hotels Group PLC is the Group's holding company and is incorporated and registered in England and Wales. Approximately 345,000 people work across IHG's hotels and corporate offices globally.

Visit us online for more about our hotels and reservations and IHG One Rewards. To download the new IHG One Rewards app, visit the Apple App or Google Play stores.

For our latest news, visit our Newsroom and follow us on LinkedIn, Facebook and Twitter.
about_the_job:
IHG® is one of the world’s leading hotel companies, with a promise to provide True Hospitality for Good. Making everyone feel welcome and cared for, recognised and respected, whoever and wherever they are in the world. Join us and not only can you benefit from the world of variety and opportunity that comes with working for a global organization, but you can also look forward to being part of a company that will appreciate you for being you. We give you room to be yourself.

Do you see yourself as IT Supervisor at Regent Bali Canggu?

Regent is the epitome of modern luxury for the world’s most discerning travelers. Pushing the boundaries of refined living since 1971, Regent colleagues have set out once more to reimagine uplifting experiences that balance serenity and stimulation to heighten the senses. We’re seeking passionate leader who is a pre-opening leader and can combine informality and fun with professionalism and sophistication, leaders with an inclusive spirit who embrace individuality and inject positivity into their work environments.

Our colleagues are fundamental to delivering the memorable experiences, and we are committed to creating a culture as diverse as the distinct hotels in our portfolio. If you understand the luxury levers that will help, bring to life a unique guest experience then we would love to hear from you.

Your day to day

Strict implementation of the Control Self-Assessment (CSA) and achieve 100% score in CSA Audit of Information & Technology category.
Demonstrate an interest in and an understanding of issues relevant to your department and hotel and keep your knowledge up to date, including legislative information.
Meet with hotel staff/clients to ascertain/understand their needs and provide prompt and professional assistance and support.
Set up and organize workstation with designated supplies, forms, and resource materials.
Build and maintain positive relationship with all internal customer and guests in order to exceed their needs.

What We Offer

In return we'll give you a competitive benefit package including, hotel discounts worldwide and the opportunity to progress your career with IHG®. Most importantly, we'll give you the room to belong.

At IHG Hotels & Resorts, we are proud to be an equal opportunity employer. IHG Hotels & Resorts provides equal employment opportunities to applicants and employees without regard to an individual's, race, colour, ethnicity, national origin, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, marital or familial status, veteran status or any other characteristic protected by law.

IHG is committed to promoting a culture of inclusion where everyone feels safe, respected and valued. We seek talent from all backgrounds to join our teams, and encourage our colleagues to bring their authentic and best selves to work.

At IHG, we’ve made a promise. As one of the world’s leading hotel groups, we’re here to deliver True Hospitality for Good. Making our guests and colleagues feel welcome, cared for, recognised and respected – wherever they are in the world. Want to be part of the journey?

Regent is the epitome of modern luxury for the world’s most discerning travelers. Pushing the boundaries of refined living since 1971, Regent colleagues have set out once more to reimagine uplifting experiences that balance serenity and stimulation to heighten the senses. This, is new. This, is Regent.

Let’s Go Further Together.

Don't quite meet every single requirement, but still believe you'd be a great fit for the job? We'll never know unless you hit the 'Apply' button. Start your journey with us today.

title: IT Manager

Company Description

"Why work for Accor?

We are far more than a worldwide leader. We welcome you as you are and you can find a job and brand that matches your personality. Do what you love, care for the world, dare to challenge the status quo! #BELIMITLESS"

experience is an asset

Fluency in English, additional languages are a plus

title: Business Development (Mekari Talenta)
company_description:
Mekari is the #1 Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) company in Indonesia, aiming to empower the progress of businesses and professionals across various industries.

Our innovative cloud-based technology solution in HR (Mekari Talenta), Accounting (Mekari Jurnal), Sales (Mekari Qontak), Tax (Mekari Klikpajak), Electronic Signature (Mekari Sign), and Benefits (Mekari Flex) have been used by tens thousands of businesses in Indonesia.

To reach millions, we need more people like you —those eager to innovate, lead, and win with us.
about_the_job:
Mekari is Indonesia's no. 1 Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) company. Our mission is to empower businesses and professionals to progress effortlessly. Our products (Mekari Talenta, Mekari Jurnal, Mekari KlikPajak, & Mekari Qontak) have been used by tens of thousands of businesses in Indonesia.

To reach millions, we need more people like you: entrepreneurs, builders, owners inside the company who are eager to grow at scale. Join us to empower more businesses with technology.

Job Descriptions

Research companies to contact in.
Start Relationship with potential Manager or CEO.
Craft emails to those contacts to convey the value of our HRIS and book an introductory meeting with them.
Make cold and warm phone calls to contacts to follow up or preempt your email communications, manage the entire sales cycle, from prospecting to call, giving demos & closing.
Experiment with different outreach intervals and content to identify successful strategies.
Collaborate with engineering and customer success team to deliver product feedback and feature requests.
Analyze and target new opportunities for Accounting or HR Software to grow our footprint.
Work directly with marketing to discover opportunities from leads, and set appointments from those leads.
Use of strong selling and influencing skills to set up qualified appointments.
Log, track, and maintain customer contact and contact records.
Participate in community networking activities to promote Accounting or HR Software.

Requirements/Qualifications

Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Comfortable and confident speaking to mid-level and senior executives.
Strong organizational skills Strong interpersonal communication skills.
Analytical, detail-oriented and results-focused Scrappy and competitive!.
Desire to drive results and improve every single day.
Prior experience selling or marketing is a plus but is not required.
We’re seeking an exceptional individual to help drive the growth of our sales efforts in the rapidly changing local delivery industry.
If Possible Have 1-2 years of experience cold calling and selling SaaS or IT products (SMEs / SMBs), preferably from Bachelor Degree in Accountancy, Management, or equivalent, but Fresh Graduate is also welcomed.
If possible track record of over-achieving quota.
Proficient with corporate productivity and with web presentation tools.
Have a positive, can-do attitude, extraordinary hustle, disdain for failure, and hunger/appreciation for feedback.
Have extraordinary oral & written communication skills.
Have deep self-motivation and the ability to self-manage.
Huge plus: experience selling to HR Manager, CEO, Accountant or Finance Manager Comfortable working in a small, distributed team.

What You Will Get

 Competitive salary + daily allowance.
 Premium private health insurance (outpatient, inpatient, maternity, dental).
 Early access to salary + flex installment (employee loan) via Mekari Flex.
 Allowance for sports activities and glasses/contact lenses.
 Flexible working hours and remote work culture with free co-working space services.
 Annual and unpaid leaves from day 1 of join date + unlimited sick leave with doctor note.
 Notebook Ownership Program.
 Strategic office location, accessible by MRT.
 Friendly and dynamic work environment.
 Opportunity to take part in growing Indonesia's no. 1 SaaS company

Our team will review your application and will be in touch if your application is shortlisted to the next stage. If you do not hear from us in 30 days, we will keep your resume on file in case a relevant opportunity opens up.

Don't forget to check our Recruitment FAQ at bit.ly/RecruitmentFAQ-Mekari [ENG] or bit.ly/RekrutmenMekari-FAQ [INA] to find the answers to commonly-asked questions regarding our recruitment process.

We wish you the best. Hope to see you around soon!

title: Expansion Manager - Indonesia
company_description: We believe in greater freedom, security, and access to money. That’s why we built the first real-world currency platform on the Bitcoin Blockchain. Tether provides a secure, fast, and low-cost way to store, send, and receive money on the Blockchain as if it were bitcoin.
about_the_job:
We are seeking a Country Expansion Manager to help expand our global presence of Tether. The ideal candidate has a degree in Business/Management/Management Engineering (MBA preferred), strong analytical skills, and a proven track record of building successful partnerships and setting/monitoring KPIs. The role requires a proactive, well-organized candidate who can work in a fast-paced environment and is comfortable with ambiguity. The Country Expansion Manager will be responsible for identifying and pursuing new business opportunities, maintaining relationships with existing customers, and collaborating with internal teams to develop go-to-market strategies. International travel is required.

Responsibilities:

Identify and pursue new business opportunities while maintaining and deepening relationships with existing customers.
Understand the Company's solutions and effectively promote their adoption.
Implement strategic initiatives and track KPIs to evaluate their success.
Collaborate with internal and external teams to develop and execute go-to-market strategies that drive business growth.
Conduct market research and analysis to identify industry trends, competitive threats, and potential growth opportunities.
Manage relationships with external partners, including vendors, customers, and industry organizations, to support business growth.
Develop sales and marketing collateral to effectively communicate the value of the company's products and services.
Deep knowledge of the country’s market and culture, including experience with the blockchain and/or fintech industry.
Native / Fluent with the country’s local language
Knowledge of the country’s regulatory and legal environment in relation to digital currencies.
BSc. / MSc. in Business / Management / Management Engineering (MBA preferred).
Strong presentation, negotiation, and business / financial planning skills.
Entrepreneurial / founding experience will be considered a plus.
Strong project, relationship, and networking management skills.
Strong analytical skills to identify market opportunities, analyze data, and make informed decisions.
Proven ability to build successful partnerships with external stakeholders.
Experience in setting and monitoring KPIs to evaluate business performance and drive growth.
Ability to work in a fast-paced, collaborative environment with adaptability to change
Comfortable working with ambiguity and prioritizing efforts.
History of establishing and maintaining relationships with customers that translated into improved financial success and market share growth.
Willingness to travel internationally across Europe and Globally when required.
Cross-cultural competence and experience in the fintech industry.
Result-oriented mindset with a strategic, analytical, and innovative thinking approach.

title: Fiel Service Engineer Staff - Bangka Belitung
company_description:
PT. Medquest Jaya Global since its establishment in 2004 concentrating in distributing medical device and pharmaceutical, by promoting innovation and latest technology. We currently distribute more than 20 leading brands in the world, which includes the equipment in the field of blood bank, cardiology, diagnostics, research and industry.

We currently divide our business into 5 divisions : blood bank, Hospital & Clinical Diagnostic, life sciences, pharmaceutical and vaccine, also overseas business. With a coverage area includes government hospitals, private hospitals, research laboratories, clinics, department of health and blood transfusion units throughout Indonesia and other country for overseas division coverage. All sales are done directly, or through tenders both domestic and international. Our field sales representatives are knowledgeable and highly trained in all of our markets and product lines.

We currently have 136 of professional employees from Marketing, Administrations, Sales, and Engineers determined to deliver better solutions to our customers that are all unique and important. We believe commitment, integrity, strong teamwork and customer satisfactions are keys to achieve our vision and mission.
about_the_job:
Company Description: PT. Medquest Jaya Global sejak berdiri pada tahun 2004 berkonsentrasi dalam distribusi alat kesehatan dan farmasi, dengan mengedepankan inovasi dan teknologi terkini. Saat ini kami mendistribusikan lebih dari 20 merk ternama di dunia yang meliputi peralatan di bidang bank darah, kardiologi, diagnostik, penelitian dan industri. Saat ini kami membagi bisnis kami menjadi 5 divisi: bank darah, Rumah Sakit & Diagnostik Klinis, ilmu hayat, farmasi dan vaksin, serta bisnis di luar negeri. Job Description:

 Install, maintain, and perform preventive maintenance on medical devices
 Ensure proper functioning of devices/equipment and spare parts
 Ensure devices operate according to standards

title: SAMPOERNA SCHOOLS SYSTEM - CREATIVE MARKETING STAFF (MATERNITY COVER)
company_description:
The Sampoerna Schools System is Indonesia’s most comprehensive, integrated educational pathway from early childhood to university. Our schools offer internationally-recognized curriculum and the opportunity to earn globally-recognized credentials and degrees that open a world of possibilities for our graduates.

Our academic program was designed by leading educators who embrace the best practices from America, Europe and Asia to create a powerful, unique educational experience that respects Indonesian culture and core values of the Putera Sampoerna Foundation:

1. Being good isn’t good enough
2. Collaboration is key to conducting our activities
3. International-standard education should be accessible for Indonesians.
about_the_job:

Job Description

Job Summary:

You will be responsible for traffic management which includes crafting project schedules, supervising the workflow of marketing and content teams, assigning project-specific tasks, handling logistics, supporting the team by removing roadblocks, and updating internal stakeholders and clients on project progress and status.

Main Duties & Responsibilities.

Organizing the project workflow within the marketing sector of the company and distributing work equally to all participating team members
Collaborating with the rest of the marketing team to implement the relevant strategies and execute on agreed-upon marketing plans
Cooperating with our creative and account departments to determine the necessary project budget
Building our marketing project schedules
Determining deadlines for each stage of ongoing and future projects
Communicating with stakeholders to get a better understanding of their project-related preferences or update them on project status

Qualifications

Bachelor’s degree in Management / Communication / Creative
0 - 1 year of experience as a Marketing Staff/ Project officer/ Traffic role related/ similar role
Excellent communication skills
Experience of administering budget and financial matters
Working knowledge of MS Office and CRM software
Fluency in English. 

Additional Information

Contract based for 3 months and available to start in February 2024

title: Head of Interconnection and Content
company_description:
Welcome to the Michael Page global company profile.

Michael Page has five decades of expertise in professional services recruitment. We were established in London in 1976, and over this period we've grown organically to become one of the best-known and most respected consultancies, with an office network spanning six continents.

While size has its advantages, it doesn't define us - the nature of our organic growth means that each new office is integrated into the region that it serves. It also means that as an employer looking to hire, or as a candidate aiming to grow your career you have the best of both worlds; a team that understands the market and geography you operate in, plus the resources and expertise of an international network at your disposal.

Our teams are broken down to focus on industry, assignment type, salary level and location, so your hiring requirements or job search will all be handled by a specialist who knows your sector inside-out. We are confident that our expertise can add value to your recruitment or job search process – get in touch to find out more.
about_the_job:
Be part of a reputable global team, reporting directly to regional C-levels|Great scope for growth and career progression


About Our Client

The client is a reputable Data Center company with globally recognised presence across different markets, providing colocation, hybrid cloud and interconnection platform. Currently looking for a Head of Interconnection to join their Jakarta office. This person will be working closely with OTT, content providers and telco operators and will be responsible for the platform's growth.

Job Description

Engage with Channel Partners and Direct Enterprises to understand their needs and deliver solutions related to interconnectivity and platform integration
Provide perspective on commercial trends and market outlook - identify and translate customer needs to potential business opportunities
Participate in workshops and events for customer engagements and networking within the community
Provide education on the possibilities of Interconnection through demos, workshops and meetings
Take ownership of sales pipeline for the interconnection and content business unit


The Successful Applicant

A Bachelor's Degree preferrably within a Technical function - Engineering, Telco, IT or Computer Science
At least 12 years of professional working experience within the IT, Network, Telco and/or the interconnectivity sector
Possess relevant knowledge and experience working with IX (Internet Exchange) and Content
Well-networked and have strong relationship with IT, Network and Connectivity Associations (APJII, APJATEL, etc.)
Familiar with B2B and B2G engagements
Excellent communication, presentation and stakeholder management skills
Exposure working at a System Integrator or IT Consulting company will be a plus

What's on Offer

Promising career growth and global exposure
Attractive remuneration package


Contact: Hashegi Hanjaya

company_description:

Michael Page has five decades of expertise in professional services recruitment. We were established in London in 1976, and over this period we've grown organically to become one of the best-known and most respected consultancies, with an office network spanning six continents.

about_the_job:
Respected Law Firm|Direct mentorship from the Managing Partner


About Our Client

My client is a respected Law Firm specialized in the Litigation practice.

Job Description

Case Management: Handle a broad spectrum of civil litigation and insolvency cases, managing all aspects of the legal process from inception to resolution
Legal Research and Analysis: Conduct comprehensive legal research, analyze precedents, statutes, and regulations to provide accurate and strategic legal advice.
Client Interaction: Interact directly with clients, assess their needs, and provide tailored legal guidance, ensuring clear communication and maintaining strong client relationships.
Drafting and Review: Prepare and review legal documents, including pleadings, motions, briefs, contracts, and agreements, ensuring accuracy and adherence to legal standards.
Court Representation: Represent clients in various courts and alternative dispute resolution proceedings, presenting arguments persuasively and advocating on behalf of the firm's clients.
Team Collaboration: Collaborate with partners, associates, and support staff within the practice group to contribute to the overall success of cases and provide mentorship and guidance to junior associates.
Business Development: Contribute to the growth of the practice group through networking, client development activities, and participating in marketing initiatives.


The Successful Applicant

A law degree from a recognized institution and admitted to the Indonesian Bar (PERADI Licensed).
Minimum of 3 years of experience in civil litigation and insolvency practice within a reputable law firm.
Deep understanding of Indonesian civil litigation and insolvency laws, procedures, and precedents.
Proven experience in courtroom litigation, strong oral advocacy, and negotiation skills.
Proficiency in legal research tools and the ability to analyze complex legal issues.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills in both English and Bahasa Indonesia.
Willing to do full WFO in South Jakarta office.
Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and mentor junior associates would be preferable.
Experience in managing client relationships and providing high-quality service would be preferable.

What's on Offer

Opportunity to get mentorship from a prominent figure in the Litigation practice
Attractive remuneration package


Contact: Rocky Reynaldo

company_description:

Michael Page has five decades of expertise in professional services recruitment. We were established in London in 1976, and over this period we've grown organically to become one of the best-known and most respected consultancies, with an office network spanning six continents.

about_the_job:
Attractive package and salary |Senior Position


About Our Client

Our client is a Logistics company specialising in Freight and Logistics services. With a strong commitment to customer satisfaction and operational excellence, they have established themselves as a prominent player in the industry. Their nationwide network, coupled with innovative technology, allows them to deliver exceptional logistics solutions to businesses and individuals across Indonesia.

Job Description

They are seeking a highly motivated and results driven individual to lead their hunting and lead generation efforts. This role will play a pivotal role in driving new customer acquisition and expanding the market presence. You will be responsible for identifying and pursuing potential clients, building strong relationships and converting leads into valuable business business opportunities. Your exceptional sales skills and strategic mindset will be instrumental in achieving revenue growth and furthering success of the company. Key responsibilities include but are not limited to:
Developing and implementing effective sales strategies to acquire new customers and achieve revenue targets
Conducting market research and identify potential leads through various channels 
Building and maintaining a robust sales pipeline, managing leads from identification to conversion 
Collaborating with sales team to ensure effective lead handover and seamless customer on boarding
Deliver persuasive sales presentations and proposals to potential clients
Stay updated on industry trends, market conditions, and competitor activities to identify growth opportunities and stay ahead in the market 
Cultivate strong relationships with key stakeholders and potential business partner to expand network and customer base
The Successful Applicant

Bachelor Degree 
Proven track record of success in Sales, particularly in hunting and lead generation 
Minimum of 10 years working experience in Freight forwarding/Logistics 
Strong networking and relationship building skills 
Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation abilities.
Self-motivated and results-driven with the ability to work independently.
Proficiency in using CRM software and other sales tools.
Willingness to travel as required.
What's on Offer
Competitive salary and attractive performance-based incentives.
Opportunity to work with a dynamic and rapidly growing logistics company.
Access to training and development programs to enhance sales and leadership skills.
Collaborative and supportive work environment that encourages innovation and creativity.
Chance to be part of a dedicated team that is shaping the future of logistics in Indonesia.
Contact: Cynthiani Marpohno

Quote job ref: JN-072023-6121166
